originalText.text: Typical spending ~120$ on a round trip ticket, the internet was not functional.   this bus had electrical outlets, but alas they too were not functional.  I also know what type quality of service to expect when handing the driver my ticket, and he blows smoke in my face.  Wish I could give negative stars rating.  Unfortunately there are very limited options available for transport to and from Pennsyltucky.

originalText.text: If there was an option for 0 stars I would have chosen 0 stars. I always take this service from Newark port Authority every weekend. Today I decided to take it home from bath, pa. Called 4 hours prior to make sure I would be at the correct spot for pick up and was told Sunoco parking lot next to intersection. Also told to make myself visible for driver. Showed up at 6:00 pm and was waiting for the bus exactly wheee I was told to wait! The bus driver didn‚Äôt even try to stop literally kept driving. Called the emergency number for assistance. Was told they were dispatching the driver to turn around. After 15 min of not hearing from them nor seeing the bus coming they told me the MANAGER SAID NOT TO TURN AROUND ! The women on the phone then stated ‚Äú it‚Äôs my last day with this company I will not be able to further help‚Äù. Terrible customer service ! I am a loyal customer that will never use there service again !

originalText.text:
Most degrading bus driver and worst bus service I've ever had, don't use this company even if it's your last option. I've ever had such horrible service, he denied 4 people to come on the bus because there tickets were not printed instead they had it on there phones because they purchased online, like most normal people do in the 21st century. I was personally rushing since It was 2:55 when I got to the gate there was no one there so I walked in. He proceeded to insult me and I said you were no where to be found he ripped my ticket and  Threw it (still haven't found it by the way) I had the 3 o clock bus from philly to Allentown September 1st. I'm sitting on the bus now, won't be surprised if he kicks me out after this.
-Greg :)

originalText.text:
I just got here at PABT in NYC coming from Easton, PA, and I came on Fullington Trailways today on Christmas Day. I got my family‚Äôs luggage stolen. The bus driver said that there were 2 different compartments for the luggage, one for NYC, and the other one for people getting of at Penn Station at Newark, NJ. But when we placed our luggage onto the bus, he didn‚Äôt say anything. He told us that he saw someone grab our bag, but he didn‚Äôt do anything. Were really mad. We were on bus 1159, hope someone can help. If you don‚Äôt want to get your bags stolen, don‚Äôt ride on Fullington Trailways. üò°üò°
P.S- this bus didn‚Äôt even have seatbelts.

originalText.text: Bus was 2 hours late. Waited in the freezing cold. Driver wouldn't let me on bc I didn't have a printed ticket.  Awful evil people left me stranded
